Mayor & City Council
====================

[Home Rule Charter](https://library.municode.com/tx/leon_valley/codes/code_of_ordinances?nodeId=HORUCH)

Information
-----------

Meeting Frequency:

1st and 3rd Tuesdays of the month at 6:30 PM

Term Lengths:

2 years

Number of Positions:

6
